name: Chainlink Phoenix
text:
3 Chainlink monsters
If you activate a "Chainlink" card or effect: you can make this card gain 100 ATK. If a Chain Link of 2 or higher resolves: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Chanlink Phoenix" once per turn. If this card leaves the field because of an opponentâ€™s card effect: You can target 1 "Chainlink" Spell/Trap card in your GY; add it to your hand.
